Mod.name: Copi's Enable Glitches
Mod.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/5aDRWYk.png[/img]
[HR][/HR] Adds mod settings which allow you to restore glitches removed as of may 16 2023!
[u][b][i]Attributions and Thanks[/i][/b][/u] [list] [*]Nathan [list][*]Uploading Tweakaroo mod, which served as an example of appending magic numbers.[/list] [*]Teh60 [list][*]Testing the mod.[/list] [*]Conga Lyne [list][*]Testing the mod.[/list] [/list]
[u][b][i]Mod Settings[/i][/b][/u] [list] [*]Wand Tag Naming [list][*]Items with the Wand tag will forcibly display the name 'Wand'.[/list] [list][*]Requires a restart or new game to change.[/list] [list][*]True by default.[/list] [*]Close Inventory When Dragging [list][*]Allow the inventory to be closed while dragging items.[/list] [list][*]Requires a restart or new game to change.[/list] [list][*]False by default.[/list] [*]Edit Spells Inventory [list][*]Allow spells to be moved in the inventory without Tinker With Wands Everywhere.[/list] [list][*]Requires a restart or new game to change.[/list] [list][*]True by default.[/list] [*]Tabletkinesis [list][*]Allow the item possession glitch on tablets.[/list] [list][*]Requires a restart or new game to change.[/list] [list][*]True by default.[/list] [*]General Itemkinesis [list][*]Allow the item possession glitch on throwable items.[/list] [list][*]Requires a restart or new game to change.[/list] [list][*]False by default.[/list] [*]5 Wanding [list][*]Allow the 5 wanding glitch to be used.[/list] [list][*]Requires a restart or new game to change.[/list] [list][*]False by default.[/list] [*]Alt Tab Silliness [list][*]Allow alt tab related exploits.[/list] [list][*]Requires a restart or new game to change.[/list] [list][*]False by default.[/list] [*]Internal IDs in Progress [list][*]Show internal IDs in the progress menu.[/list] [list][*]Requires a restart or new game to change.[/list] [list][*]False by default.[/list] [/list]
[u][b][i]Warnings[/i][/b][/u] [list] [*]As of uploading this mod, this relies on Beta Branch features. [list][*]This may change in the future.[/list] [/list]
